message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I don't think $11,000 is within my means.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
